metadata.title: CVE-2022-4131 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 10.8 before 15.5.7, all versions starting from 15.6 before15.6.4, all versions starting from 15.7 before 15.7.2. An attacker maycause Denial of Service on a GitLab instance by exploiting a regex issue inhow the application parses user agents.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
